pages.title: Pedestals as Light Sources
pages.text: Inserting Glowstone (Block) into a pedestal will add some glowing bands to the pedestal, which emit light.

pages.title: Glowstone (Inserting)
pages.text: When inserting, it can be done with the glowstone in the Offhand, then Right Click the pedestal, this will remove one glowstone from your hand, placing it in the pedestal.

pages.title: Glowstone (Extracting)
pages.text: When extracting, put the glowstone in the Offhand, then Left Click. This will remove the currently inserted glowstone from the pedestal.
